pageContext.claim: “Anytime you hear a Democrat saying that you can have good Border Security without a Wall, write them off as just another politician following the party line. Time for us to save billions of dollars a year and have, at the same time, far greater safety and control!”
pageContext.analysis: The wall is expected to cost at least $25 billion, along with hefty annual maintenance costs. Trump suggests the United States would save "billions" a year by halting illegal immigration but the numbers are in dispute.
